channel.title: Liuxie on Wind&Bones
channel.description: Recent content in Liuxie on Wind&Bones

item.title: Why Wind&Bones?
item.description: When we set up Wind&Bones back in 2018, we wanted a name that reflected our vision of writing, creativity and social change. And after a lot of discussion, eventually we came up with Wind&Bones. But what’s in a name? And why are we called this? Is one of us “Wind” and one of us “Bones”? Are these our secret superhero names? Alas, no! But the real story is fun and interesting too, and it goes back to medieval China.
